title: ♪Boys and Girls of every rank. Wouldn't you like to see something strange?♪
body:
Team with us and you will see
This, our game of Harrowing.

 This is Harrowing, this is Harrowing
Minions scream in the dead of night

This is Harrowing, everybody make a scene
Ping or feed till the neighbors gonna die of fright
It's our lane, everybody scream
In this rift of Harrowing

{{champion:107}} I am the one hiding in this bush. Teeth ground sharp and eyes glowing red

{{champion:17}} I am the one hiding in your jungle. Poison in my darts and shrooms everywhere

This is Harrowing, this is Harrowing

Harrowing! Harrowing! Harrowing! Harrowing! 
In this game we call home
Everyone hail to the summoner code 

{{champion:83}} In this game, don't we love it now? Everybody's waiting for the next surprise

Round that corner, man hiding in the fog
Something's waiting now to pounce, and how you'll... 

{{champion:19}} Scream! This is Harrowing
{{champion:154}} Red 'n' black, slimy green

Aren't you scared?

{{champion:99}} {{champion:117}} Well, that's just fine. Say it once, say it twice

{{champion:4}} Take a chance and load the dice

{{champion:131}} Ride with the moon in the dead of night

{{champion:57}} Everybody scream, everybody scream

In our game of Harrowing! 

{{champion:35}} I am the clown with the knife in your back. Here in a flash and gone without a trace

{{champion:157}} I am the "who" when you ping “MIA”. I am the wind blowing through your lane.

{{champion:56}} I am the shadow on the moon at night. Filling your dreams to the brim with fright

This is Harrowing, this is Harrowing
Harrowing! Harrowing! Harrowing! Harrowing! 
Harrowing! Harrowing! 

{{champion:429}}  Tender lumplings everywhere. Life's no fun without a good scare
{{champion:50}} {{champion:7}}  That's our job, but we're not mean. In our game of Harrowing.

In this match

Don't we love it now?

Everybody's waiting for the next surprise
Fiddlestick Jack might catch you in the back
And scream like a {{item:3102}} 
Make you jump out of your skin
This is Harrowing, everybody scream
Wont' ya please make way for a very special guy

Our man Fiddle is King of the Pumpkin patch
Everyone hail to the Pumpkin King, now! 

This is Harrowing, this is Harrowing
Harrowing! Harrowing! Harrowing! Harrowing! 

{{champion:429}} In this game we call home. Everyone hail to the summoner code. 

http://www.leagueoflegendsskins.com/images/champions/splash/Fiddlesticks_4.jpg

replies.body:
For Halloween, let me give you the creepiest applause I could find:

http://24.media.tumblr.com/7c8f337e0d9991f8df1cef1a7a4e2e17/tumblr_mjid4wyaUe1r8bsvyo1_500.gif

(it was this or that monkey with cymbals)
http://gifsec.com/wp-content/uploads/GIF/2014/07/thank-you-animated-gif.gif?gs=a
Anyone else read it with the respective champion voices?
I was hoping people would.
I sang it as I heard it from Nightmare before christmast
Sing away.
Read? SING :D
I know I did. XD
I read it as the narrator of the Thriller Music video
Can confirm, makes it even better.
http://dxe5lcrjpy7emwfo.zippykid.netdna-cdn.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/09/tumblr_inline_nq4prkyBpj1t26qoy_500.gif

I got Laughing Fish. Success 

http://static.comicvine.com/uploads/original/10/105240/4020956-7926236000-Batma.jpg

My....
Fucking....
God....








SOMEONE CALL FALCONSHEILD

The rhyming was a little off, but the tempo was surprisingly well kept and some of the characters chosen fit far more than I thought.

9/10, would scream.

The hardest part was getting some things to rhyme. Part of me was thinking of not changing anything, but then it would of been boring. 

It not perfect, but I am glad people are liking it. :D

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qztch6_Uhuk

Now with more Soul Eater!

I'm sorry I even asked now...

Me too :^)
Aye
Proof that you do not need to regurgitate boatloads of special effects to make a good AMV.
Shoutout to all the other people who also read it out loud in the voices of the Nightmare Before Christmas characters
http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/mlp/images/f/fb/Give_That_Man_A_Cookie_meme.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20140306133505

Why thank you. 

https://www.fastly.com/sites/default/files/blog-posts/cookiemonster.gif

Allow me to fix your rhymes, son.

{{champion:107}} I am the one hiding in this bush. **Hungry growls and goin' for an ambush.**

{{champion:17}}  I am the one hiding **here and there**. Poison in my darts and shrooms everywhere

Round that corner, man hiding in the **black mist**
Something's waiting now to pounce, and now you'll...

{{champion:35}} I am the clown with the knife in your back. Here in a flash and **gone for an attack!**

Our man **Fiddle's** King of the Pumpkin Patch
Everyone hail to the Pumpkin King, now!

Awesome. But all I can think of when I see your title is: 

"Boys and girls of every rank, wouldn't you like some memes that're dank."

On one hand, this is super awesome. Props to you.

Now on the other hand, the complete butchering of the rhymes made me literally cringe,
Sorry for the butchering.
Thank you for your Harrowing spirit Lightdragoon.

downvoted cause you want minions to be in pain GOSH 
(just kidding i love this)

( It's not the same {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} )
it could be gr8 if riot released harrowing i mean its halloween cmon..

A Fedora tip for you, m'summoner.
Seriously doe, that was pretty damn sick :D Made my day a bit funner :p Thanks bruv
http://i.imgur.com/eTQUJot.gif

My god, i thought a mod had come up with this but..our very own community member did. This makes me soo happy, i was a bit depressed because i couldn't do anything for Halloween but this..this **epic** work of art has satisfied my fix and quelled my sadness for Halloween this year, and so i think you 1000x over my friend!!.
